name: play-ts-cucumber
description: Playwright Cucumber TS framework - The easiest way to learn

scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' npm run test:command && npm run posttest
scripts.test:tag: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' npm run test:tag:command && npm run posttest
scripts.testonly: npx cucumber-js test/features/my.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require-module tsconfig-paths/register --require src/global.ts --require src/hooks/parameterHook.ts --require test/steps/**/*.ts

author: NCS
